metadata.titleEn: Qilian Mountains integrated observatory network: Dataset of Heihe integrated observatory network (automatic weather station of Zhangye wetland station, 2019)
metadata.titleCn: 祁连山综合观测网：黑河流域地表过程综合观测网（张掖湿地站自动气象站-2019）
metadata.description:
This dataset includes data recorded by the Heihe integrated observatory network obtained from the automatic weather station (AWS) at the observation system of Zhangye wetland station from January 1 to December 31, 2019. The site (100.4464° E, 38.9751° N) was located on a wetland (reed surface) in Zhangye National Wetland Park, Gansu Province. The elevation is 1460 m. The installation heights and orientations of different sensors and measured quantities were as follows: air temperature and humidity profile (HMP45AC; 5 and 10 m, north), wind speed profile (03002; 5 and 10 m, north), wind direction profile (03002; 10 m, north), air pressure (CS100; 2 m), rain gauge (TE525M; 10 m), four-component radiometer (CNR1; 6 m, south), two infrared temperature sensors (SI-111; 6 m, south, vertically downward), soil heat flux (HFP01; 3 duplicates, -0.06 m), soil temperature profile (109ss-L; 0, -0.02, -0.04, -0.1, -0.2 and -0.4 m), and four photosynthetically active radiation (PQS-1; two above the plants, 6 m, south, one vertically downward and one vertically upward; two below the plants, 0.25 m, south, one vertically downward and one vertically upward).
The observations included the following: air temperature and humidity (Ta_5 m and Ta_10 m; RH_5 m and RH_10 m) (℃ and %, respectively), wind speed (Ws_5 m and Ws_10 m) (m/s), wind direction (WD_10 m) (°), air pressure (press) (hpa), precipitation (rain) (mm), four-component radiation (DR, incoming shortwave radiation; UR, outgoing shortwave radiation; DLR_Cor, incoming longwave radiation; ULR_Cor, outgoing longwave radiation; Rn, net radiation) (W/m^2), infrared temperature (IRT_1 and IRT_2) (℃), soil heat flux (Gs_1, Gs_2, and Gs_3) (W/m^2), soil temperature (Ts_0 cm, Ts_2 cm, Ts_4 cm, Ts_10 cm, Ts_20 cm and Ts_40 cm) (℃), on the plants photosynthetically active radiation of upward and downward (PAR_U_up and PAR_U_down) (μmol/ (s m^-2)), and below the plants photosynthetically active radiation of upward and downward (PAR_D_up and PAR_D_down) (μmol/ (s m^-2)).
The data processing and quality control steps were as follows: (1) The AWS data were averaged over intervals of 10 min for a total of 144 records per day. The missing data were denoted by -6999. (2) Data in duplicate records were rejected. (3) Unphysical data were rejected. (4) The data marked in red are problematic data. (5) The format of the date and time was unified, and the date and time were collected in the same column, for example, date and time: 2019-6-10 10:30. (6) Finally, the naming convention was AWS+ site no. Moreover, suspicious data were marked in red.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2019年1月1日至2018年12月31日黑河流域地表过程综合观测网中游张掖湿地站气象要素观测数据。站点位于甘肃省张掖市国家湿地公园，下垫面是芦苇湿地。观测点的经纬度是100.4464E, 38.9751N，海拔1460m。空气温度、相对湿度传感器架设在5m、10m处，朝向正北；气压计安装在2m处；翻斗式雨量计安装在10m处；风速传感器架设在5m、10m处，风向传感器架设在10m处，朝向正北；四分量辐射仪安装在6m处，朝向正南；两个红外温度计安装在6m处，朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向下；土壤温度探头埋设在地表0cm和地下2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正南方；土壤热流板（3块）依次埋设在地下6cm处；四个光合有效辐射仪分别架设在冠层上方和冠层内，冠层上方安装在6m（探头垂直向上和向下方向各一个）、冠层内安装在0.25m（探头垂直向上和向下方向各一个）高处，朝向正南。
观测项目有：空气温湿度（Ta_5m、RH_5m、Ta_10m、RH_10m）(单位：摄氏度、百分比)、气压（Press）(单位：百帕)、降水量（Rain）(单位：毫米)、风速（WS_5m、WS_10m）(单位：米/秒)、风向（WD_10m）(单位：度)、四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR_Cor、ULR_Cor、Rn）(单位：瓦/平方米)、地表辐射温度（IRT_1、IRT_2）(单位：摄氏度)、土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2、Gs_3）(单位：瓦/平方米)、土壤温度（Ts_0cm、Ts_2cm、Ts_4cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_40cm）(单位：摄氏度)、冠层上向上与向下光合有效辐射（PAR_U_up、PAR_U_down）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒)和冠层下向上与向下光合有效辐射（PAR_D_up、PAR_D_down）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒)。
观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）数据中以红字标示的部分为有疑问的数据；（5）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2019-6-10 10:30；（6）命名规则为：AWS+站点名称
黑河综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of meteorological data collected at a wetland site in terms of sensor placement and measured variables?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 湿地站点收集的气象数据的特征包括传感器的布置和测量变量。
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: sensor placement at various heights and orientations, air temperature sensors at 5m and 10m, relative humidity sensors at 5m and 10m, barometer at 2m, rain gauge at 10m, wind speed sensors at 5m and 10m, wind direction sensor at 10m, four-component radiometer at 6m, infrared thermometers at 6m, soil temperature probes at 0cm, 2cm, 4cm, 10cm, 20cm, 40cm, photosynthetically active radiation sensors above and within the canopy, measured variables include air temperature, relative humidity, atmospheric pressure, precipitation, wind speed, wind direction, radiation components, surface radiation temperature, soil heat flux, soil temperature, photosynthetically active radiation above and below the canopy
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 传感器在不同高度和方向的布置，空气温度传感器在5米和10米处，相对湿度传感器在5米和10米处，气压计在2米处，雨量计在10米处，风速传感器在5米和10米处，风向传感器在10米处，四分量辐射计在6米处，红外测温仪在6米处，土壤温度探头在0厘米、2厘米、4厘米、10厘米、20厘米、40厘米处，光合有效辐射传感器在冠层上方和内部，测量的变量包括空气温度、相对湿度、大气压力、降水、风速、风向、辐射分量、地表辐射温度、土壤热通量、土壤温度、冠层上方和下方的光合有效辐射。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many weather observation stations are involved in the comprehensive observation network of the Heihe River Basin?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 黑河流域综合观测网络涉及多少个气象观测站？

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do data collection methods for meteorological and soil observations in a reed wetland environment compare to those used in an urban meteorological monitoring station?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在芦苇湿地环境中，气象和土壤观测的数据收集方法与城市气象监测站使用的方法相比，有哪些不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: In a reed wetland environment, data collection methods involve installing sensors at various heights and depths to measure parameters such as air temperature, humidity, wind speed, soil temperature, and radiation, with specific attention to the unique ecological characteristics of wetlands, such as proximity to water and vegetation cover. In contrast, an urban meteorological monitoring station might focus more on atmospheric conditions influenced by human activity and infrastructure, with sensors possibly being mounted on buildings or other structures, and less emphasis on soil or canopy measurements.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 在芦苇湿地环境中，数据收集方法涉及在不同高度和深度安装传感器，以测量空气温度、湿度、风速、土壤温度和辐射等参数，特别关注湿地的独特生态特征，如靠近水体和植被覆盖。相比之下，城市气象监测站可能更关注受人类活动和基础设施影响的大气条件，传感器可能安装在建筑物或其他结构上，较少强调土壤或树冠的测量。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the objective of implementing comprehensive observation networks to study meteorological and surface processes in wetland areas like the Zhangye wetland station?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 实施综合观测网络以研究湿地地区（如张掖湿地站）的气象和地表过程的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to obtain detailed and accurate meteorological data and surface process information for the Heihe River Basin, which aids in understanding the dynamics of wetland ecosystems. This includes capturing variations in air temperature, humidity, pressure, precipitation, wind speed and direction, radiation, and soil temperature, which are critical for ecological research, water resource management, and climate modeling.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是获取黑河流域的详细和准确的气象数据和地表过程信息，以帮助理解湿地生态系统的动态。这包括捕捉空气温度、湿度、气压、降水、风速和风向、辐射以及土壤温度的变化，这些对于生态研究、水资源管理和气候建模至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are followed to ensure the accuracy and consistency of meteorological data collected from an automatic weather station in a wetland environment?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了确保在湿地环境中收集的自动气象站气象数据的准确性和一致性，遵循哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data collection procedures include setting up sensors for air temperature and relative humidity at 5m and 10m, a barometer at 2m, a rain gauge at 10m, wind speed sensors at 5m and 10m, and a wind direction sensor at 10m. The four-component radiometer is installed at 6m facing south. Infrared thermometers are set up at 6m facing vertically downward. Soil temperature probes are buried at various depths from the surface to 40cm, and soil heat flux plates are buried at 6cm depth. Photosynthetically active radiation sensors are placed above and within the canopy. Data undergoes quality control to ensure 144 data points per day, and missing data is marked as -6999. Duplicate records are removed, and data that is physically unrealistic or exceeds instrument capacity is deleted. Questionable data is marked in red, and date and time are formatted consistently.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据收集程序包括在5米和10米处设置空气温度和相对湿度传感器，在2米处设置气压计，在10米处设置雨量计，在5米和10米处设置风速传感器，在10米处设置风向传感器。四分量辐射计安装在6米高，朝南方向。红外温度计设置在6米高，朝垂直向下方向。土壤温度探头埋在从表面到40厘米的不同深度，土壤热通量板埋在6厘米深处。光合有效辐射传感器放置在树冠上方和树冠内。数据经过质量控制，以确保每天144个数据点，缺失数据标记为-6999。重复记录被删除，物理上不合理或超过仪器容量的数据被删除。可疑数据用红色标记，日期和时间格式一致。
